ch0118_42_lillie/0101_0701_01_10:
Alola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been
waiting for you!
ch0118_42_lillie/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s spend another day playing lovely music
with our Pokémon!
ch0118_42_lillie/7101_0701_01_10:
Soft music makes us feel at peace, and lively
music lightens our hearts.
ch0118_42_lillie/7101_0701_02_10: I hope to play music like that someday.
ch0118_42_lillie/7102_0701_01_10: I raised my Primarina from an Egg Elio gave me.
ch0118_42_lillie/7102_0701_02_10: She often plays with Elio’s Primarina.
ch0118_42_lillie/7102_0701_03_10:
When the two of them start singing, they sound so
amazing that sometimes they’re swarmed by
people and Pokémon!
ch0118_42_lillie/7103_0701_01_10:
I feel like the sky is clearer on cold nights, and
you can see the stars better.
ch0118_42_lillie/7103_0701_02_10:
I know the best stargazing spots on Pasio. I hope
I can show you sometime.
ch0118_42_lillie/7104_0701_01_10: Look at this frilly outfit and big boots!
ch0118_42_lillie/7104_0701_02_10: I feel cute from head to toe!
ch0118_42_lillie/7105_0701_01_10:
I love spending a special day with people I care
about.
ch0118_42_lillie/7105_0701_02_10:
But even ordinary days with people I care about
feel special.
ch0118_42_lillie/7105_0701_03_10: I guess what I’m trying to say is...
ch0118_42_lillie/7105_0701_04_10:
I’m so glad I get to spend time with you and
friends, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0118_42_lillie/1701_0702_01_10:
Giving you this makes me happy too, so don’t
hesitate to use it!
ch0118_42_lillie/2501_0701_01_10:
It takes a lot of practice for a musical performance
to come together.
ch0118_42_lillie/2501_0701_02_10:
So when everyone’s finally in sync, we all get
excited!
ch0118_42_lillie/2501_0701_03_10:
Playing music with my friends made me realize
how grateful I am they’re by my side.
ch0118_42_lillie/2501_0702_01_10:
Sharing an emotion with someone is truly moving,
whether it’s with another person or with a
Pokémon.
ch0118_42_lillie/2501_0702_02_10:
I think I like Pokémon battles and music because
both make me more aware of the bonds
between us.
ch0118_42_lillie/2511_0701_02_10:
Let’s sing some... I mean, wanna belt out some
tunes with me?!
ch0118_42_lillie/2511_0701_03_10: ...That was my impression of a certain star.
ch0118_42_lillie/2511_0701_04_10: Could you feel my “spirit” in it?
ch0118_42_lillie/2511_0702_01_10: You can play an instrument or sing. Either’s fine.
ch0118_42_lillie/2511_0702_02_10: And it doesn’t matter if you’re good or not.
ch0118_42_lillie/2511_0702_03_10:
I just want to make some music,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0118_42_lillie/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! The air is so clear and fresh—it’s
a great start to the day!
ch0118_42_lillie/3003_0701_01_10:
Talking with everyone warms my heart, even on
cold days.
ch0118_42_lillie/3005_0701_01_10:
I feel so calm on quiet nights. They’re also good
for wishing on a star.
